Youâ€™d do better looking for an Airbnb

I don't know what you consider too much, but the Residence Inn Alexandria Old Town has suites with two bedrooms. The River Inn in DC definitely has large suites with a separate bedroom that could sleep 3 females.
Be flexible do not commit nonrefundable money. No one knows yet what June brings wrt travel and COVID-19
